text: @HHSGov @WhiteHouse @SecAzar @POTUS Essentially, Trump has decided the economy can no longer be restrained and is willing to take a miscalculated risk irregardless of experts advice. For Trump, his re-election has been the only thing that matters and the COVID19 is an impediment he no longer wants to waste time on.
